subNodes.conversationText: root
Fools, why have you attacked my people?
Your people attacked us.  Nevertheless, we are here to negotiate your leaving this land.
Negotiate?  Alright, let's negotiate...should we kill you quickly or slowly?
I believe it will be in your best interest to hear us out.
Yes, and if they so choose, my sword can do the talking.
You have seen what we can do.  We are giving you the option to keep your life and leave peacefully.
We have our orders, and leaving is not one of them.
Would you care to share with us these orders and who gave them?
My orders are my own.  Whom they come from is none of your business.
Then why reveal the fact that you have orders, if you did not wish to discuss them?
Why not?  I do as I please.
This is a waste of time.  Let's end this.
I agree.  Talking time is over, prepare to die...
Battle Begins...
[Diplomacy] You plan on killing us anyway, why not entertain us with a little information.
[Success] Fine.  We take orders from Zorn, himself.  If you know what is good for you, you would try and avoid his attention.
That is impossible, Zorn was banished years ago.
[Failed] Enough talk, time for you to die...
Battle Begins...
[Intimidate] I suggest you start talking before we loose our patience and exterminate all of you pests.
[Success] We take orders from Zorn, himself.  If you know what is good for you, you would try and avoid his attention.
That is impossible, Zorn was banished years ago.
Well, he's back and now it is time for you to die...
Battle Begins...
[Failed] Enough talk, time for you to die...
Battle Begins...
Then why bring it up?
Why not?  I do as I please.
Would you care to share with me these orders and who gave them?
My orders are my own.  Whom they come from is none of your business.
Orders?  From whom?  Explain yourself.
My orders are my own.  Whom they come from is none of your business.
Orders?  Care to explain yourself.
My orders are my own.  Whom they come from is none of your business.
You're right Fledge, this parley is going nowhere fast.
Enough talk, time for you to die.
Battle Begins...
You have seen what we can do.  We are giving you the option to keep your life and leave peacefully.
You're right Fledge, this parley is going nowhere fast.
Have it your way.  I figured you would choose death over life.
Enough talk, time for you to die.
I told you this wouldn't work
Looks like my sword will need to finish the negotiations.
You're right Fledge, this parley is going nowhere fast.
You have seen what we can do.  We are giving you the option to keep your life and leave peacefully.
You have seen what we can do.  We are giving you the option to keep your life and leave peacefully.
You're right Fledge, this parley is going nowhere fast.
Looks like my sword will need to finish the negotiations.
You're right Fledge, this parley is going nowhere fast.
You have seen what we can do.  We are giving you the option to keep your life and leave peacefully.
You have seen what I can do.  I am giving you the option to keep your life and leave peacefully.
We have our orders, and leaving is not one of them.
You shall pay for the massacre of so many peaceful Tree Spirits.
We need trees to build this fort.  Our assignment must be completed.  Annoying tree spirits just get in the way.
Well, your time has come to an end.
We shall see...
Battle Begins...
What assignment?  Who has commanded you to build this fort?
That is my business.  Now, prepare to die...
Battle Begins...
